name: Historic Gloves

description: Plays the chosen song throughout Sun's Refuge.

description: Double-click to summon this mini to follow you around. Only one mini may be in use at a time.

name: Story Unlock: "A Star to Guide Us"
Sands of Time
description: Plays the chosen song throughout Sun's Refuge.

name: Bottle of Fear (Empty)
description:
Holding this empty bottle, you feel slightly uncomfortable, as if something watches you from afar.

<c=@flavor>Abandoned long ago, but only recently realized.</c>

name: Heket Stone Axe
description:
A relic from a time when heket were common throughout Kourna.

This item only has value as part of a collection.

name: Argon Locket
description:
A tarnished silver locket containing an exquisite miniature family portrait. At least, it was exquisite before it was defaced.

This item only has value as part of a collection.

name: Endless Djinn Tonic
description: Double-click to transform into a djinn or to return to normal.

name: Memorial for a Friend
description: An inscription on this memorial says, "For Zor, who listened to everyone's troubles."

name: Conjured Amalgamate Token
description: Found in the Conjured Amalgamate's Chest. Double-click or trade in at the guild decoration trader to earn a decoration.

description: Plays the chosen song throughout Sun's Refuge.

description: Double-click to transform into a djinn or return to normal.

description:
Whatever power this scroll had is gone now. Near its bottom is an inscription in antique script: "No refunds!â€”Kohn."

description: Plays the chosen song throughout Sun's Refuge.

description: Plays the chosen song throughout Sun's Refuge.

name: Defender's Largos Swiftblade
description: <c=@flavor>Though the blade's contours appear delicate, its edge will never dull and its sheen will never tarnish.</c>

name: Assaulter's Largos Greatbow
description: <c=@flavor>Though today the mountains and earth alter the sea's course, in time they will bow to the water's whims.</c>

name: Mini Branded Riftcrawler
description: Double-click to summon this mini to follow you around. Only one mini may be in use at a time.

name: Unstable Branded Awakened Wind-Up
description: <c=@flavor>Too soon? Or too fast and too fun?</c>

name: Qadim's Assaulter War Gavel
description: <c=@flavor>A spiteful weapon crafted by a spiteful djinn.</c>

name: Bottle of Joy (Filled)
description: Nearly weightless and possessed of some sort of bubbly energy, this jar is very pleasing to hold.

description: Double-click to summon this mini to follow you around. Only one mini may be in use at a time.

description:
This isn't the Great Zehtuka's Horn, but every hunter winds up with more horns than she can use.

There might be someone in Yatendi village looking for this.

description: This rune glows with energy that feels like nature. Perhaps it has a use somewhere.

description:
It's unclear how old this cloth could be.

description: Every moment you hold this jar, you feel something terrifying stalking behind you.

description: Used to purchase guild decorations.

name: How to Grow a Choya

Double-click to read.

This item has no value outside of a collection.

name: Sun's Refuge Rumor
description: Word has it that a skilled armorsmith who served Joko has taken shelter in Sun's Refuge.

name: Pact Excavation Contract
description:
Purchasing this contract sends a Pact excavation team to Sun's Refuge.

This item is consumed immediately.

name: A Brief History of Cantha
description:
Double-click to read.

description: Permanently gain bonus karma while killing foes in Jahai Bluffs. Stacks up to three times.

name: Crusty Brand Crystal
description:
A crystal from a Branded creature in Jahai.

This item only has value as part of a collection.

name: Bottle of Contempt (Empty)
description:
You would much rather not be carrying this jar.

<c=@flavor>The searing fire of rage bubbles over into a cauldron of contempt.</c>

name: Crystal from the Mists
description:
A parting gift from Glint. It hums with strange energy.

Someone in Sun's Refuge might be interested in this.

name: Historic Headgear
description: Double-click this item to open it and receive your choice of reward.

name: Crystal Infusion of Condition Damage
description: Double-click to apply to an unused infusion slot. May cause slight discomfort.

name: Sands of the Djinn
description: Plays the chosen song throughout Sun's Refuge.

name: Kournan Brazier
description: Purchase to deposit this decoration into guild storage.

name: Shard of Tlehco
description:
Used to craft the legendary scepter precursor Tlehco.
Combine in the Mystic Forge with Mystic Runestones, a Gift of Energy, and a Gift of the Mists to create the Gift of Xiuquatl.

name: Requiem Plate Skin
description: Double-click to apply this look to any other heavy armor.

name: Bottle of Contempt (Filled)
description: Every moment you possess this jar, you are filled with a nearly overwhelming sense of unease and discomfort.

name: Pile of Old Kournan Bounties
description:
All those named here have probably died of old age.

This item only has value as part of a collection.

description: Double-click to summon this mini to follow you around. Only one mini may be in use at a time.

name: Historic Shoulders
description: Double-click this item to open it and receive your choice of reward.

name: Blessed Coffer of the Sun
description: Contains a large bounty including Mistonium, a gold find bonus, rare gear, and Volatile Magic.

name: Malicious Conjured Amalgamate Greatblade
description: <c=@flavor>The alloys used in the forging of this blade come from no single locale. To wield it is to visit all the lands of Tyria.</c>

name: You and Your Springer
description:
Double-click to read.

This item has no value outside of a collection.

name: Tribute to Tlehco
description: Use artificer crafting to refine into Shard of Tlehco, used to craft the legendary scepter precursor Tlehco.

name: Elonian Red Trout
description: A rare Elonian fish. Lofa in Yatendi is interested in these.

name: Zafirah's Rifle Skin
description: Double-click to apply this look to any other rifle.

name: Sun's Refuge Portal Scroll
description: Double-click to teleport to Sun's Refuge. <c=@Warning>This item cannot be used while in combat.</c>

name: Sand Compass
description:
This device can be attached to your jackal for an hour to locate corrupted sand around Elona.

Interacting with an active device will disable it.

name: Bottle of Excitement (Filled)
description: Your mood is raised significantly thanks to your possession of this jar.

name: Crystal Infusion of Boon Duration
description: Double-click to apply to an unused infusion slot. May cause slight discomfort.

name: Crystal Infusion of Power
description: Double-click to apply to an unused infusion slot. May cause slight discomfort.

name: Bottle of Surprise (Filled)
description: There is something curiously and perpetually astounding about this jar.

description: Double-click to unlock this raptor mount skin for your account.

name: Requiem Tassets Skin
description: Double-click to apply this look to any other heavy leggings.

name: Slightly Smelly Slab of Steak
description: <c=@flavor>You shouldn't eat this, but it might be good for something.</c>

name: Child's Toy
description: A wooden roller beetle.

name: Caravan Supply Crate
description: Event Item

name: Bottle of Joy (Empty)
description:
This jar seems to possess the faintest traces of positivity, but is otherwise devoid of contents.

<c=@flavor>Unbridled joy is the domain of youth.</c>

name: Packet of Seeds
description: A small packet of vegetable seeds. This could help feed hungry villagers in Yatendi.

description: Double-click to apply this look to any other medium leggings.

description: <c=@flavor>Though today the mountains and earth alter the sea's course, in time they will bow to the water's whims.</c>

name: Bottle of Rage (Empty)
description:
The faintest air of rage clings to this otherwise empty vessel.

<c=@flavor>Rage burns and consumes, not unlike a fire.</c>

description: <c=@flavor>The alloys used in the forging of this blade come from no single locale. To wield it is to visit all the lands of Tyria.</c>

description: <c=@flavor>The alloys used in the forging of this blade come from no single locale. To wield it is to visit all the lands of Tyria.</c>

name: Jahai Bluffs Empowerment
description: Permanently gain 10% bonus experience while in Jahai Bluffs. Stacks up to three times.

name: Zafirah's Tactical Outfit
description:
Double-click to wear this outfit.

Outfits are full sets of clothing that hide other armor. This will not change individual armor pieces, and you will still receive your current armor stats.
